L2_gloss: The first letter of the Eastern Mari alphabet, written in the Cyrillic script.
(obsolete) taste food (while public praying before eating)
water (transparent liquid substance formed by hydrogen

time (inevitable progression into the future; duration of that progression)
жап эрта — time is passing
мыйын яра жапем уке — I don't have any free time
жап - окса — time (is) money
жап гыч жапышке — from time to time
жапын' шуйнымыжо — duration (lit. length of time)

child (boy or girl up to approximately 14 years)
изи йоча — small, little child
мотор йоча — beautiful child
йочам пушкаш — to feed a child
йоча жап — childhood (lit. child time)
йоча модыш — children's toys
йоча муро — nursery rhyme (lit. children's song)
(body) tongue (organ in the mouth used for moving food
snow (noun or phrase used to refer to a particular

name (noun or phrase used to refer to a particular person, place, class, or thing)
вершӧр лӱм — place name
еҥ лӱм — a person's name
лӱмым вашталташ — to change one's name
лӱмым пуаш — to give a name, to name
мыскылтыш лӱм — nickname
лӱмет кузе? — what is your name?
пийын лӱмжӧ - Ошеч — the dog's name (is) Ošeč

house, dwelling
еш пӧрт ― ješ pört ― family house
кӱ пӧрт ― kü pört ― stone house
пу пӧрт ― pu pört ― wooden house
изи пӧрт ― izi pört ― small house
пӧртым чоҥаш ― pörtym čoṅaš ― to build a house
пӧрт ӧрт ― pört ört ― house spirit
The sixteenth letter of the Eastern Mari alphabet
